  1. Docs
  2. <no title>
  • 1. Request to log in to the Jetstream Portal
  • 2. Use “XSEDE”
  • 3. Fill in the username and password and click “Sign in”
  • 4. Select Projects and “Create New Project”
  • 5. Name the project for yourself, click “create”
  • 6. Boot an instance with a pre-built image
  • 7. Find the “DIBSI 2018 workshop image” image, click on it
  • 8. Name it something simple
  • 9. Wait for it to become active
  • 10. Click on your new instance to get more information!
  • 11. Miscellany
  • 12. Suspend your instance

  • 13. Shutting down your instance
    • 13.1. Restarting your instance
  • 14. Deleting your instance
